im new to the xbox thing is there a speical kind of disk i need to burn it on

@djnicolo
You need to flash your xbox 360 disk drive. It's a relatively easy job, no soldering should be needed, though you do need a connectivity kit, just google it. But it's not as simple as just downloading, and there is a risk of a console ban. It shouldn't be a problem if you keep updating your drive though.
